an10.172:1.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban”ti.
an10.172:1.5: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an10.172:2.1: Atha kho tesam bhikkhunam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.172:2.2: “idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.172:2.5: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti.
an10.172:2.6: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya”ti?
an10.172:3.2: “ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.172:3.3: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.172:3.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham puccheyyama.
an10.172:3.5: Yatha no ayasma mahakaccano byakarissati tatha nam dharessama”ti.
an10.172:4.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim sammodimsu.
an10.172:4.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavocum:
an10.172:5.1: “Idam kho no, avuso kaccana, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.172:5.4: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti.
an10.172:6.1: Tesam no, avuso, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.172:6.2: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
an10.172:6.5: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
an10.172:7.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.172:7.3: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.172:7.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.172:7.5: Yatha no ayasma mahakaccano byakarissati tatha nam dharessama’ti.
an10.172:8.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso saratthiko saram gavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva mulam atikkamma khandham sakhapalase saram pariyesitabbam manneyya.
an10.172:8.2: Evamsampadamidam ayasmantanam satthari sammukhibhute tam bhagavantam atisitva amhe etamattham patipucchitabbam mannatha.
an10.172:8.3: So havuso, bhagava janam janati passam passati cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
an10.172:8.4: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam tumhe bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
an10.172:8.5: Yatha vo bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
an10.172:9.1: “Addha, avuso kaccana, bhagava janam janati passam passati cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
an10.172:9.2: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam mayam bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.172:9.3: Yatha no bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyama.
an10.172:9.4: Api cayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.172:9.5: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.172:10.1: “Tena havuso, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an10.172:10.2: “Evam, avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakaccanassa paccassosum.
an10.172:11.1: “Yam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.172:12.1: Katamo cavuso, adhammo; katamo ca dhammo?
an10.172:12.2: Katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.172:12.5: ye ca panatipatapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:12.6: panatipata veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:13.3: ye ca adinnadanapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:13.4: adinnadana veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:14.3: ye ca kamesumicchacarapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:14.4: kamesumicchacara veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:15.3: ye ca musavadapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:15.4: musavada veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:16.3: ye ca pisunavacapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:16.4: pisunaya vacaya veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:17.3: ye ca pharusavacapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:17.4: pharusaya vacaya veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:18.3: ye ca samphappalapapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:18.4: samphappalapa veramanipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:19.3: ye ca abhijjhapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:19.4: anabhijjhapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:20.3: ye ca byapadapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:20.4: abyapadapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:21.3: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.172:21.4: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.172:22.1: ‘Yam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
an10.172:22.4: Imassa kho aham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
an10.172:22.5: Akankhamana ca pana tumhe, avuso, bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
an10.172:22.6: Yatha no bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
an10.172:23.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakaccanassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
an10.172:24.1: “Yam kho no, bhante, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.172:25.1: Tesam no, bhante, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
an10.172:25.2: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
an10.172:25.5: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
an10.172:26.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
an10.172:26.3: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
an10.172:26.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipuccheyyama.
an10.172:26.5: Yatha no ayasma mahakaccano byakarissati tatha nam dharessama’ti.
an10.172:27.1: Atha kho mayam, bhante, yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham apucchimha.
an10.172:27.2: Tesam no, bhante, ayasmata mahakaccanena imehi akkharehi imehi padehi imehi byanjanehi attho suvibhatto”ti.
an10.172:28.2: Pandito, bhikkhave, mahakaccano. Mahapanno, bhikkhave, mahakaccano.
an10.172:28.3: Mancepi tumhe, bhikkhave, upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha, ahampi cetam evamevam byakareyyam yatha tam mahakaccanena byakatam.
an10.172:28.4: Eso ceva tassa attho. Evanca nam dhareyyatha”ti.
